contentfulProduct.seoDescription: The classic pullover for cozy, laidback days. The heavyweight 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, and the interior kangaroo phone pocket keeps essentials. Made from 100% organic cotton.
contentfulProduct.title: Heavyweight Organic Fleece Hoodie
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $68

content.value: Buy any 3 activewear, downwear, cashmere or socks items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

The classic pullover for cozy, laidback days. The heavyweight 375g cotton fleece feels plush and luxurious, and the interior kangaroo phone pocket keeps essentials secure when you're on the move. Made from 100% organic cotton.
Material: 100% organic cotton 375g heavyweight fleece
Custom fabric process for a butter-soft feel both inside and out
Hidden cell phone pocket inside front kangaroo pocket (fits iPhone XS)
Metal drawstring tips and eyelets
Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
Model is 6'1 and wearing a size Medium
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.
